txt.en: Bring the Sword of the Vigil to Nethraw

'Finally, the last of the seven swords! This weapon is called the Sword of the Vigil, and it was borne by the leader of the Seven Sentinels, a knight who made his post in the most dangerous part of Angmar -- a place perhaps even more deadly than Carn Dûm itself!

'I speak of Nan Gurth, a place inhabited by terrible beasts and the most evil of foes. The tale tells not where in this dread place the sword can be found. Truly, I hesitate to ask you to go to such a terrible place, merely to satisfy my curiosity, and perhaps to uncover an ancient hoard. But too, it would be a shame to stop now, when we are so close!

'Certainly, as before, this quest is far too dangerous for a single adventurer to attempt alone.'
'The seven swords! Collected at last! I am trembling with excitement. But one small obstacle remains....'
'I would never forgive myself if I sent you to your death! Please be careful.'
'Where is the Sword of the Vigil?'
You have recovered six of the seven swords, and Nethraw is most pleased.
Search for the Sword of the Vigil

The Sword of the Vigil is somewhere in Nan Gurth.\n\nNethraw told you the last of the seven swords may be found in a deadly place called Nan Gurth. He again warned you that allies will be required to obtain the sword.
Bring the Sword of the Vigil to Nethraw
Nethraw is back at the Fane of the Seven Sentinels, east of Gabilshathûr.\n\nYou should bring the Sword of the Vigil to Nethraw.
